Class NPC

java.lang.Object
  Character
      NPC
Direct Known Subclasses:
NPCPavan, NPCShaman, NPCWarrior
public abstract class NPC
extends Character

NPC class is abstract and extends Character. This class has 3 abstract methods that must be realized for all NPC sub classes. When our hero encounters an NPC, the interface will always provide a description of the NPC and allow the hero to talk or barter with the NPC.

Constructor Summary
NPC()
          Default NPC constructor.
NPC(String name, String greeting)
          Construct NPC with name and greeting message.
 
Method Summary
abstract  void barter(Hero h)
          Runs a barter sequence between the Hero object and the NPC object.
abstract  String describe()
          Returns a description of the NPC.
abstract  void talk(Hero h)
          Runs a dialogue between the Hero object and the NPC object.
 
Methods inherited from class Character
getGreeting, getName, setGreeting, setName, toString
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

NPC

public NPC()
Default NPC constructor.

NPC

public NPC(String name,
           String greeting)
Construct NPC with name and greeting message.

Method Detail

barter

public abstract void barter(Hero h)
Runs a barter sequence between the Hero object and the NPC object. Since the sequence is handled within the NPC object, a reference to the Hero object must be passed in such that the methods of our Hero object are also accessible.

describe

public abstract String describe()
Returns a description of the NPC. Used to introduce the character.

talk

public abstract void talk(Hero h)
Runs a dialogue between the Hero object and the NPC object. Since the dialogue is handled within the NPC object, a reference to the Hero object must be passed in such that the methods of our Hero object are also accessible.
